name: Plumber Connect Pipes
description:
Plumber connect pipes is an awesome brain teasing pipeline puzzle game in which you have to connect pipes in correct order to get the water flowing from one source to the main water tanks. From kids to adults everyone can play and enjoy this fun and hard thinking puzzle game which gives your mind a great exercise while having a joy playing.

Story in short: Pureville is a town with purest form of water and most of it's business is run on water based products. But one day some jealous folks from neighboring town of Swampville disrupted the whole town's water supply system and shook the economy of Pureville. So as the most skilled plumber of Pureville you are the people's last hope to fix the pipeline.

Features in this brain teasing Game:
Gorgeous looking Antique styled graphics.
Various colorful skin packs to enhance your playing experience.
Truly Brain Teasing levels with it's own difficulty and challenges.
Crafted in a way to enhance thinking capabilities and get a Mind Exercise.
Easy to use controls.
In-App Purchases to remove Ads and buy in-game currency.
